Manual instruction to install ScaleRichView Export Interface 
------------------------------------------------------------

Please follow the manual instruction to install ScaleRichView Export Interface :
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------

- Ensure the LIB path of the reporting component is already set in the IDE.

Delphi XE2 
==========
1)Go to File |Open Project | (edoc engine Installation Path)\ source \ScaleRichVw  Open the group project gtScaleRichVwExpIntfD16.groupproj and Build It.
2)Copy the corresponding runtime bpl file gtScaleRichVwExpD16.bpl  to System 32  (In case of windows 7 use Syswow64 instead of System 32).  
3)Install DCLgtScaleRichVwExpD16 Package.

Delphi XE 
==========
1)Go to File |Open Project | (edoc engine Installation Path)\ source \ScaleRichVw  Open the group project gtScaleRichVwExpIntfD15.groupproj and Build It.
2)Copy the corresponding runtime bpl file gtScaleRichVwExpD15.bpl  to System 32  (In case of windows 7 use Syswow64 instead of System 32).  
3)Install DCLgtScaleRichVwExpD15 Package.

Delphi 2010
===========
1)Go to File |Open Project | (edoc engine Installation Path)\ source \ScaleRichVw  Open the group project gtScaleRichVwExpIntfD14.groupproj and Build It.
2)Copy the corresponding runtime bpl file gtScaleRichVwExpD14.bpl  to System 32  (In case of windows 7 use Syswow64 instead of System 32).  
3)Install DCLgtScaleRichVwExpD14 Package.

Delphi 2009
===========
1)Go to File |Open Project | (edoc engine Installation Path)\ source \ScaleRichVw  Open the group project gtScaleRichVwExpIntfD12.groupproj and Build It.
2)Copy the corresponding runtime bpl file gtScaleRichVwExpD12.bpl  to System 32  (In case of windows 7 use Syswow64 instead of System 32).  
3)Install DCLgtScaleRichVwExpD12 Package.
